text: It was really clean. The service was fast and very friendly. The pizza and salad bar was super fresh. Would eat here again. üçïüçïüçï

name: Patrick Mayville
text: Pretty sure I just had the best experience I've ever had at a Pizza Hut. Waitress was friendly and good at her job. Breadsticks were well seasoned, and we were given 6 so each of us could have 3, despite an order only having 5. Infused drink was well mixed. Pizza was perfectly done - no burning, and no underdone spots.
